channel.title: data on PeakBlog
channel.description: Recent content in data on PeakBlog

item.title: More data manipulation with pandas
item.author: andershurum@gmail.com (@peakbreaker)
item.description: Data Exploration Working with data is a lot of fun. In this day and age, there is a lot of data, but a lack of data stories. Exploring data is about uncovering the stories that the data may hold - whether it is anomalies or powerful insights. Beyond the basics My first post on working with data using pandas goes into the basics of cleaning data and some core utilities, I would recommend starting there.

item.title: Data Cleaning with pandas
item.author: andershurum@gmail.com (@peakbreaker)
item.description: Clean data Pandas is a data library. I dont actually mean those cute bears. This post is based on a pull from my personal notes when learning to work with data in python with pandas (So it might not be perfect, but hey - Im trying). These are some of the essentials tools/skills I picked up about cleaning data. Data scientists actually spend the majority of their time wrangling and cleaning
